name: Chalk'em
description:
Keep your classroom quiet while you are writing on the board to complete the lesson the fastest as possible.

Commands (Keyboard Only):
- F & J: Hold keys to write the lesson
- Blue Keys: Throw Chalks to noisy students

Be careful: You can'y throw and write with the same hand

Points:
- Good shot: +10 pts
- Super smash: +50 pts
- Seconds left: +10pts each

Super Smash:
Hit the bird to get the Super Smash chalk. Next shot calm one side.

Game realised for KeysToTheJam 2021 Edition
